notes.title: Performance Issue - Critical
notes.content: Client experiencing latency issues during peak hours (9-11 AM PST). This is affecting their customer service response times. Technical team investigating - appears to be related to token throttling. Need to resolve before renewal discussion in Q1.

notes.title: Renewal Risk Assessment
notes.content:
Risk factors for renewal:
1. Recent performance issues (being addressed)
2. CEO mentioned budget constraints
3. Competitor evaluation in progress

Mitigation:
- Resolve performance issues by Dec 10
- Prepare strong ROI documentation
- Consider pricing flexibility
